description: With more than 3 years of experience, I build interactive web applications using a variety of languages and frameworks such as React, Next.js and Express.js.

proyects.description: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

surasalud.title: Health insurance
surasalud.description: Optimized high-converting landing pages for a Google Ads campaign, aimed at selling Sura brand insurance.

suraautos.title: Car insurance
suraautos.description: Optimized high-converting landing pages for a Google Ads campaign, aimed at selling Sura brand insurance.

artofgalaxy.title: Art of galaxy
artofgalaxy.description: React aplication with modern design. For marketing company.

inglesenminutos.title: Ingles en minutos
inglesenminutos.description: Educational platform for learning English, integrating AI models from Google and AssemblyAI for speech recognition.

integragym.title: Integra gym
integragym.description: Internal management system for a gym. My focus was on implementing payment, membership, and plan modules, as well as member registration and control.

latrikmedical.title: Latrik medical
latrikmedical.description: Internal management system for a clinic. The front-end developed in react.

landing.title: Landing Page Development for Digital Marketing Campaign
landing.description: Created and optimized high-converting landing pages for a Google Ads campaign, aimed at selling Sura brand insurance.
duties: User interface design
Conversion optimization
Front-end and back-end development using React and Next.js
Integration of Google Ads and Google Analytics

xtetic.title: Medical License Verification System Development
xtetic.description: Development of an automated system for validating medical professional licenses for the company Xtetic. The project utilized web scraping to streamline and verify information from multiple sources, optimizing a critical process.
duties: I was responsible for the analysis and design of a web scraper for medical license validation, defining the logic and architecture for the data extraction process.
I developed a program in Node.js to implement the scraper and create a separate API.
I handled the integration with the JotForm and Pipedrive APIs, consuming data to enrich information and automate the workflow.
I was in charge of the complete project deployment on AWS, configuring the environment to ensure the service's availability and correct operation.

inglesenminutos.title: Development of an AI-Powered Educational Web Application
inglesenminutos.description: Participated in the creation of an educational platform for learning English, integrating AI models from Google and AssemblyAI for speech recognition.
duties: Integration with assemblyAI and speech.
Interface and logic for audio recording.
Logic for incorrect word recognition.
Payment and membership system.
User registration system.

integragym.title: Internal Management System Development for a Gym
integragym.description: Development of an internal management system for a gym. My focus was on implementing payment, membership, and plan modules, as well as member registration and control.
duties: I implemented and configured a secure payment system for the gym, managing transaction processing and the financial history of all members.
I developed a complete interface for membership management, allowing for the creation, editing, and tracking of each user's status.
I created the user interface and logic for member check-ins and check-outs, controlling access and tracking attendance at the gym.

artofgalaxy.title: Web Application Implementation with Modern Design
artofgalaxy.description: Participated in the creation of a web application focused on an engaging user experience (UX) and a modern design. Multiple animations and effects were implemented for a visually appealing and dynamic user interface (UI).
duties: Implementation of animations and effects
Implementation of a well-designed grid layout
Implementation of interactive slideshows
Correction of design errors

description.p1: I'm a versatile software developer with extensive experience across multiple <1>frameworks</1> and languages, primarily within the <3>JavaScript ecosystem</3>. My work spans both the <5>frontend and backend</5>. On the client side, I've built dynamic and responsive user interfaces using frameworks like <7>React</7> and <9>Angular</9>. For the server side, I've leveraged <11>Next.js</11> and <13>Express.js</13> to develop robust and scalable applications.
description.p2: Beyond my JavaScript proficiency, I have experience with <1>PHP</1>, where I've focused on creating custom <3>WordPress themes and plugins</3>. My skill set also includes mobile development, having built cross-platform applications with <5>React Native</5> and <7>Flutter</7>. I complement these abilities with expertise in <9>web scraping</9> using tools like <11>Playwright</11>, efficiently extracting data for various projects.
